ygData.subject: Killed a clockwork
ygData.msgSnippet: I was with a couple of friends yesterday who are level 50. They were bored so I suggested going to kill a clockwork spider in Ak Anon. We all went in and they
ygData.messageBody:
I was with a couple of friends yesterday who are level 50. They were bored so I suggested going to kill a clockwork spider in Ak'Anon. We all went in and they ended up killing Clockwork XIIC (a spider). It was blue to both of them. Loot that came from the spider was a C series blackbox (Which I believe is part of a warrior quest), and a Silvered Rod which is a lore item. Does anyone know what this silvered rod is for?

Brillian
